✕

This is \*\*\* fight over funding the Department of Homeland Security following the deadly shootings in Minneapolis. Senate Democrats demanded new restrictions be placed on ice, for example, ending so-called roving patrols and tightening rules for warrants. Masks need to come off. Cameras need to stay on, and officers need visible identification.
